page.title: 11Apley Castle Nurseries
page.content: Near Apley Castle is{Apley nurseries } owned by Telford Development Corporation,Mr. Watkins rents Apley nurseries.Automatic watering systems were fitted to water the plants.The nurseries were opened in 1964.His plant food costs Â£2,000 per ton. The nerseries open at 8.00 am and close at 7.00 pm.Mr.Watkins works 90 hours a week.The nurseries cover 0.88 of a hectare.In a day,7-8,000 plants are sold in a day from the nurseries. Mr.Watkins said that the new road doubly increased his custom throughout the week. The first{Apley Castle}was built in 1307 and owned by the Charltons.At the start of the Civil War,it was held by the Royalists.In March 1644 it was taken by the Parliamentarians but soon recaptured.The last Apley Castle was demolished in 1957.
